items.sentence: Tom knew he barely had enough time to do what he wanted to do.
Tom came back to Boston after spending three years in Chicago.
Tom wondered if it would be difficult to find a job in Boston.
Mt. Fuji, the highest mountain in Japan, is 3,776 meters high.
Japan is now very different from what it was twenty years ago.
You should be able to find better things to do with your time.
If you work for us, you'll make three times what you make now.
You're probably thinking that we don't really need to do that.
I wanted Tom to do that, but he was busy doing something else.
Tom doesn't smoke in his house because his wife won't let him.
